mapper.select: select count(*) from inventory where mem_code= #{mem_code}

select * from ( select iv.mem_code, iv.medi_code, iv.rt_inven, mi.medi_name, mi.supply_value, mi.selling_price, mi.manu_com, mi.chief_ingre, mv.vari_code from inventory iv join medi_information mi on iv.medi_code = mi.medi_code join medi_variation mv on mi.medi_code = mv.medi_code where mem_code= #{mem_code} order by mi.medi_name desc )
